moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Manage Host File Entry Removal
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module allows the attacker to remove an entry from the Windows hosts file.
author: vt <nick.freeman@security-assessment.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: Domain name to remove from the hosts file.
